Variable Definition: The Remoteness Index is calculated using data on the cost and time of travel from a given school to its Central DepEd office.
The CCT Ratio is the percentage of students at a school receiving conditional cash transfers in a given year.
Whether or not a school has access to water.
Whether or not a school has access to internet.
Whether or not a school has access to electricity.
The number of students per teacher at a given school.
The number of students per classroom at a given school.
